Do Not Sell or Share My Personal Information; Limit the Use of My Sensitive Personal Information The California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA) grants California consumers the right to opt out of the “sale” and “sharing” (as those terms are defined under applicable law) of their personal information, and to limit the use and disclosure of their sensitive personal information. Condé Nast may sell/share your personal information depending on the ways in which you interact with us. We may also use and disclose certain of your sensitive personal information for Online Behavioral Advertising (OBA) and cross-contextual behavioral advertising purposes.

• Online sales/shares through cookies. If you browse on Condé Nast sites, we may be using cookies and similar tracking technologies (we refer to these collectively as “cookies”) to serve you targeted advertising.
• Other online or offline sales/shares. If you provide your name, email address, or postal address when you subscribe to or register with one of our magazines, services, or events, we may sell/share your personal information in other ways, such as by using your email address to identify you online for targeted advertising and/or by sharing your name and postal address with third parties for their marketing purposes.
• Limit the Use of My Sensitive Personal Information. Since your sensitive personal information may be used in some of the sales/shares described above, we treat your request to opt out of sales/shares as a request to limit the use of your sensitive personal information in that context.

To opt out of online sales/shares that occur on this site through cookies, move the “Sell/Share My Personal Information On This Site Using Cookies” toggle to the left, and press “Confirm my Choices.” This will also limit the use of your sensitive personal information. This opt out function is brand-, browser-, and device-specific. Therefore, if you visit other Condé Nast brands, visit this site from a different browser or device, or clear your cookies, you will need to opt out of sales/shares through cookies again.

To opt out of other sales/shares, provide your information on theCCPA Opt Out Form below, which will help us locate your records, and press submit. This will also limit the use of your sensitive personal information. You can also submit this request by calling 1-888-914-9661 and using PIN 867 610.
